  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialPlatform

      public SpecialPlatform​(city.cs.engine.World w, float x, float y)
      Constructor.

      Creates a special platform in the level that uses this class.

      Parameters:
      w - the level that needs a special platform created.
      x - the given X Co-ordinate.
      y - the given Y Co-ordinate.

  • Method Details

    • moveXRight

      public void moveXRight()
      Movement Method.

      A method to move a special platform to the right. Used in conjunction with moveXLeft for horizontal movement.

    • moveXLeft

      public void moveXLeft()
      Movement Method.

      A method to move a special platform to the left. Used in conjunction with moveXRight for horizontal movement.

    • moveYUp

      public void moveYUp()
      Movement Method.

      A method to move a special platform upwards. Used in conjunction with moveYDown for vertical movement.

    • moveYDown

      public void moveYDown()
      Movement Method.

      A method to move a special platform to the downwards. Used in conjunction with moveYUp for vertical movement.

    • getX

      public float getX()

      X co-ordinate

      public int getBreaker()

      Returns:
      Y Co-ordinate

    • setBreaker

      public void setBreaker​(int breaker)
      Setter for platforms X co-ordinate.
      Parameters:
      breaker - the value the breaker field in this class will be set to.
